title: SPS Cohort Extraction Record
description: Draft schema generated from datasheet_examples_MC_Cohorts.csv for group-level cohort extraction.

ID.description: Section: Study Details | Meaning: Study ID | Guidance: Study ID

extractor.description: Section: Study Details | Meaning: Initials of extractor | Guidance: Initials of extractor

first_author.description: Section: Study Details | Meaning: First author's last name | Guidance: First author's last name

pub_year.description: Section: Study Details | Meaning: Publication year | Guidance: Publication year

country.description: Section: Study Details | Meaning: Country/Countries where study was conducted | Guidance: Country/Countries where study was conducted

study_design.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Meaning: Study Design (for case reports or small series, use the case report form) | Guidance: Study Design (for case reports or small series, use the case report form)

aims.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Meaning: Aims of the Study | Guidance: Aims of the Study

participant_number.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Meaning: Number of participants | Guidance: Number of participants

age_central_measure.description:
Section: Study Characteristics | Meaning: Age - measure of central tendency. Select one of the following:
- mean
- median
NA = not available, NR, not reported | Guidance: Age - measure of central tendency. Select one of the following:
- mean
- median
NA = not available, NR, not reported

age_central.description: Section: Study Characteristics | Meaning: Age - value of central tendency (numeric) | Guidance: Age - value of central tendency (numeric)

age_variability_measure.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Age - measure of variability (listed in order of preference)

SD = standard deviation (1st preference)
SE = standard error (2nd)
95CI = 95% confidence interval (3rd)
IQR = interquartile range
range = range (5th)
NA = not available, not reported (6th) | Guidance: Age - measure of variability (listed in order of preference)

SD = standard deviation (1st preference)
SE = standard error (2nd)
95CI = 95% confidence interval (3rd)
IQR = interquartile range
range = range (5th)
NA = not available, not reported (6th)

age_variability.description: Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Age - value(s) of variability | Guidance: Age - value(s) of variability

ethnicity.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Ethnicity (select one)
- white = White/Caucasian
- africa = African/ Afro-Caribbean
- E_asia = East Asia (Japan, Korea, China)
- S_asia = South Asia (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka)
- SE_asia = South East Asian (everything East of India and South of China which will cover Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore)
- latin = Latin American (non-African origin; central and S America, without Caribbean)
- other = other (specify in next column) | Guidance: Ethnicity (select one)
- white = White/Caucasian
- africa = African/ Afro-Caribbean
- E_asia = East Asia (Japan, Korea, China)
- S_asia = South Asia (India, Pakistan, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka)
- SE_asia = South East Asian (everything East of India and South of China which will cover Thailand, Malaysia, Singapore)
- latin = Latin American (non-African origin; central and S America, without Caribbean)
- other = other (specify in next column)

ethnicity_specify.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Ethnicity (specify)
If you selected "other", specify with text. Otherwise leave blank. | Guidance: Ethnicity (specify)
If you selected "other", specify with text. Otherwise leave blank.

percent_males.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Percent Males
Male patients/Total patients. List the value to two decimal places (e.g. "45.55") | Guidance: Percent Males
Male patients/Total patients. List the value to two decimal places (e.g. "45.55")

included_diagnosis.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Diagnosis of participants included (select)
- Stiff_Person
- Stiff_Limb
- PERM
- new_category = new category if identified, specify
- mixed = mixed population
- other = other, specify in next column
- NA = not available, NR, not reported | Guidance: Diagnosis of participants included (select)
- Stiff_Person
- Stiff_Limb
- PERM
- new_category = new category if identified, specify
- mixed = mixed population
- other = other, specify in next column
- NA = not available, NR, not reported

included_diagnosis_specify.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Diagnosis (specify)
If you selected new_category or other, specify with text | Guidance: Diagnosis (specify)
If you selected new_category or other, specify with text

diagnostic_criteria.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Criteria used to make the diagnosis
Provide below the details of the criteria used to make the diagnosis - copy and paste from text if needed (no special characters) | Guidance: Criteria used to make the diagnosis
Provide below the details of the criteria used to make the diagnosis - copy and paste from text if needed (no special characters)

disease_severity.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: Disease Severity
If the study recruited patients with a specified severity - Copy and paste from manuscript the explanation of severity and how this was defined. | Guidance: Disease Severity
If the study recruited patients with a specified severity - Copy and paste from manuscript the explanation of severity and how this was defined.

first_manifestation.description:
Section: Population Characteristics | Meaning: First manifestation
If study reports first symptoms of a group of participants, copy and paste below from the manuscript. If details for individual cases provided, use case report form. | Guidance: First manifestation
If study reports first symptoms of a group of participants, copy and paste below from the manuscript. If details for individual cases provided, use case report form.

spsd_symptom.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: SPSD symptoms in early disease (select)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in next col | Guidance: SPSD symptoms in early disease (select)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in next col

spsd_symptom_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Additional data for previous column - if multiple symptoms reported
List symptoms as text, separated with semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank. | Guidance: Additional data for previous column - if multiple symptoms reported
List symptoms as text, separated with semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

spsd_symptom_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Additional data for previous column - if other symptoms reported
List symptoms as text, separated with semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank. | Guidance: Additional data for previous column - if other symptoms reported
List symptoms as text, separated with semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

stiffness_onset_distribution.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Stiffness distribution at onset (select)
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised (specify in next col)
- generalised = generalised
- other = other, specify in next col | Guidance: Stiffness distribution at onset (select)
- lumb_prox_LE = lumbar/proximal legs
- distal_LE = distal leg(s)
- UE = arm(s) / upper extremity
- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)
- multiple = multiple, but not generalised (specify in next col)
- generalised = generalised
- other = other, specify in next col

stiffness_onset_distribution_multiple.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Stiffness at onset (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank. | Guidance: Stiffness at onset (multiple)
If "multiple" was selected, list as text, separated by semicolons. Otherwise, leave blank.

stiffness_onset_distribution_other.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Stiffness at onset (other)
If "other" was selected, specify with text. Otherwise, leave blank. | Guidance: Stiffness at onset (other)

Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Excessive startle (select)
- touch = to touch
- noise = to noise
- visual = to visual stimuli | Guidance: Excessive startle (select)
- touch = to touch
- noise = to noise
- visual = to visual stimuli

symptoms_established.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: SPSD symptoms in established disease (select single option from list)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- anxiety
- oculomotor = oculomotor disturbance
- cerebellar
- visual = visual symptoms (e.g. photosensitivity)
- cognitive
- gastrointestinal = other than abdominal wall muscle cramps)
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in overnext col | Guidance: SPSD symptoms in established disease (select single option from list)
- stiffness
- spasms
- startle = excessive startle
- anxiety
- oculomotor = oculomotor disturbance
- cerebellar
- visual = visual symptoms (e.g. photosensitivity)
- cognitive
- gastrointestinal = other than abdominal wall muscle cramps)
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in overnext col

- axial = axial(thoracic,neck)

established_mRS.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Disability when disease fully established
(SPSD symptoms established; mRS)
0 - No symptoms.
1 - No significant disability.
2 - Slight disability.
3 - Moderate disability.
4 - Moderately severe disability.
5 - Severe disability.  incontinent.
6 - Dead | Guidance: Disability when disease fully established
(SPSD symptoms established; mRS)
0 - No symptoms.
1 - No significant disability.
2 - Slight disability.
3 - Moderate disability.
4 - Moderately severe disability.
5 - Severe disability.  incontinent.
6 - Dead

treatment.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Course / symptoms potentially influenced by treatment ? (select)
- none = no treatment
- BZD = benzodiazepine or similar

- BZD = benzodiazepine or similar
- immunotherapy
- both = both symptomatic and immunotherapy
- NA = not available, not reported

- GAD
- GlyR
- amphiphysin
- DPPX
- seronegative
- multiple = multiple, specify in next col
- other = other, specify in next col
- not_tested = no test performed
- NA = not available, not reported, unclear if tested | Guidance: Antibody status (select)

Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: Antibody notes
If not covered by columns to the left, give as text note. Otherwise, leave blank. | Guidance: Antibody notes

CSF_status.description:
Section: Disease Characteristics | Meaning: CSF (select)
- normal
- inflammatory
- isolated protein elevation
- not_done = no CSF analysis performed
- antibody_present = antibody present in CSF (specify Ab and titre in next cols)
- NA = not available / NR | Guidance: CSF (select)
- normal
- inflammatory
- isolated protein elevation
- not_done = no CSF analysis performed
- antibody_present = antibody present in CSF (specify Ab and titre in next cols)
- NA = not available / NR

- none = no fhx for SPSD or autoimmunity

different_treatment.description: Section: Investigations and Tests | Meaning: If treatment description does not fit the previous columns, specify the treatment as text and use the next columns to provide details. | Guidance: If treatment description does not fit the previous columns, specify the treatment as text and use the next columns to provide details.

Section: Investigations and Tests | Meaning: Adverse events (text)

sampling.description:
Section: Sampling and Analysis | Meaning: Sampling (text)
Copy from methods how recruitment was performed, such as single site or multicentric, consecutive patients, clinic, community, and other details. | Guidance: Sampling (text)

sample_size_calc.description:
Section: Sampling and Analysis | Meaning: Sample size calculation, study power (text)
